E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 9/22/1982
Subject: Progress of Fernando Vallejo
Dear Sir,
Fernando Vallejo has nothing more to prove at A Peoria Chiefs!
He has an AVG of .310 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Jason Reiber is sick...
Diagnosis: Stomach Flu.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 6 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor
